original_text: Some other people wanted to test Jesus to see what he would do. So they asked him, ‘Do something powerful for us to see. Then we will know that God has really sent you.’
korean_text: 또 더러는 예수를 시험하여 하늘로부터 오는 표적을 구하니

sentences.original_text: Some other people wanted to test Jesus
to see what he would do
Do something powerful for us to see
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 볼 수 있도록 강력한 무언가를 해보세요

sentences.original_text: that God has really sent you
